text: Colin Anderson (born 26 April 1962) is an English former professional footballer, predominantly playing on left side of defence or midfield. == External links == * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Newcastle upon Tyne Category:English footballers Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Torquay United F.C. players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Walsall F.C. players Category:Hereford United F.C. players Category:Exeter City F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football utility players Category:Dawlish United F.C. players Category:North Shields F.C. players
title: Colin Anderson (footballer)
